name: Human Repair Project
description:
You are a scientist. You know, those type who is good in their mind but also a little crazy.

People got injured, and they come to you for help. Please take a look at their need, and make sure you help them with what they want.

Global Game Jam 2020 game, theme "Repair".

Made together with Chloe Ju, Jessy Wang, Nancy Zhou.

Special thanks to Christ Chung(Particle Effects, Shader, Technical Support) & Jason Shaw(Puzzle 1 Music - "EmilyWalksAway")JC
